title: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
description: When a table report item is added and the data set is not set, the group dialog should still be accessible. Currently, it is not possible to define a group when the dataset is not defined.
OB: When a table report item is added and the dataset is not set, clicking on the 'Group' option does nothing. The group dialog does not open.
EB: When a table report item is added and the dataset is not set, clicking on the 'Group' option should open the group dialog. This allows the user to define a group even when the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Create a new report.
2. Add a table report item to the report.
3. Do not set the data set for the table.
4. Right-click on the table and select 'Group'.
5. Verify that the group dialog opens, allowing the user to define a group.
